property.name: text
property.value:
This Ptolemy II model uses the gem5 computer architectural simulator. A gem5 simulator modified for the intergration with this model can be obtained from the gem5-Ptolemy repository on GitHub.
Click on this annotation to visit the repository: https://github.com/gem5-ptolemy/gem5-ptolemy.

property.name: text
property.value: Click here for our workshop paper on the integration of gem5 and Ptolemy using this model as a case study. https://chess.eecs.berkeley.edu/pubs/1194.html

property.name: text
property.value: This model requires that GEM5 be installed!

property.name: text
property.value: Realizes a function of the form: T = k + ? Power_i * T_resistance_i With: k ... constant temperature, e.g., ambient Power_i ... Power consumption of component i T_resistance ... temperature resistance of component i

property.name: text
property.value: Realizes a function of the form: T = k + Power_i * T_resistance_i With: k: constant temperature, e.g., ambient Power_i: power consumption of component i T_resistance: temperature resistance of component i
